item.description:
Checkout HumanKind and The Energy playing at
The Church of Boston, 69 kilmarnock st, Boston May 11th


Church of Boston

About HUMANKIND
NU GRUNGE / ROCK / ALTERNATIVE

Anyone care to Join me for some HUMANKIND?

A dangerous rock & roll band of side show freaks and masters of mind control.
An epic trio of world traveling street performers, gypsy born mongrel babies and alien space hooligans.
HUMANKIND plays Nu Grunge Rock and Roll, punky angst filled hard core tunes, and at times perform freakish circus sideshow tricks live on stage.

HUMANKIND delivers a thunderous hard rocking show that make you want to take off your clothes, paint yourself red and spin around like you are the only person left on the planet, while sifting through the angst of your soul for the essence of rock.


Listen to HumanKind

HumanKind

Listen to The Energy

Not sure if there is a cover charge, Church's website is not updated yet for this show!
Time of event subject to change, not listed on Al's E-mail or listed on schedeule.

Get out and Checkit out!
Hope to Meetup with some of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I can provide my Cell phone number to those member that are going. Might have a meet-up sign depending on whether or not I can get a table or not.
item.why: Because you can get introduced to great new artists and have a good time!
item.name: HumanKind (Grunge/ Rock / Alt) @ Church
